Fix plugin search bars using conflicting ids.
Fix event handler sometimes incorrectly bound to the hidden search bar (plugin catalog).
releaseNotes.10.8.6-2:
Apply patch 'thornbill/add-loading-component'.
Apply patch 'thornbill/connection-state-refactor'.
Install latest 'package.json'.
Synchronize translations.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-0: Fix a few layout inconsistencies in the dashboard pages.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-1:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'grafixeyehero/Convert-Movies-Page-to-react' modified.
Apply patch 'fix resolving of history back promise'.
Apply patch 'fix-react-router-dialogs'.
Install latest 'package.json'.
Apply patch 'Rename and convert dfnshelper to typescript'.
Apply patch 'Optimize loading of date-fns'.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-2:
Apply patch 'Migrate all user routes to react router'.
Apply patch 'Migrate all admin routes to react router'.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-3:
Upgrade react component 'Filter' to apply a new style when a filter is set.
Add a reset button to the react component 'Filter'.
Apply patch 'thornbill/improve-view-restores'.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-4:
Synchronize translations.
Enable filter options for the movie collections view.
Upgrade react component 'Sort' to apply a new style when a filter is set.
Add a reset button to the component.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-5:
Synchronize translations.
Optimize and clean recent changes made to REACT components 'sort' and 'filter'.
Fix some issues found inside original code for non-REACT'd libraries (photos, series etc..).
releaseNotes.10.8.7-6:
Synchronize translations.
Disable text overlays when titles are explicitly unset.
Users can zeroize their preferences in one click from their profile page.
Fix small issues with the layout of the profile page.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-7:
Synchronize translations.
Use the userSettings instance already in use for users doing the reset.
Force the controllers for display/subs/playback pages to reload the data at every Show event.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-8:
Synchronize translations.
Fix links let without event handler (user menu).
Reset cached views upon logout to avoid confusions when signing in and out with multiples accounts.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-9:
Synchronize translations.
Enable reset of server-side user configuration (stored in user obj).
Code cleanup and optimization (user pages).
releaseNotes.10.8.7-10: Restore menu bar pin that got broken by latest update.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-11:
Users are offered a list of configuration templates which they install by doing a configuration reset (Profile settings).
Proposed templates are defined in config.json and therefore can be easily customized by admins.
Fix Blurhash factor that couldn't be set to 0 (Display settings).
Fix many minor issues.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-12:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'nielsvanvelzen/leftover-likes'.
Apply patch 'nielsvanvelzen/seriesstatus-extended'.
Apply patch 'thornbill/convert-plugin-config'.
Apply patch 'jsayol/patch-1'.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-13:
Synchronize translations.
Fix error occuring when no JSON data is available for the parser (Subtitles Settings).
releaseNotes.10.8.7-14:
Synchronize translations.
Fix selects' list of options growing up at every opening of some of the user pages.
Fix subtitles' preview functionality which got broken by recent changes.
Fix small layout issues with the subtitles settings.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-15:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'thornbill/async-react-pages'.
Fix more misbehaving selects and other layout issues in user pages.
Install latest 'package.json'.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-16:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'nielsvanvelzen/directory-browser-go-up'.
Apply patch 'Vankerkom/tweak-navigation-sizing'.
Apply patch 'Vankerkom/tweak-active-devices-card'.
Apply patch 'dmitrylyzo/fix-subtitleuploader'.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-17:
Synchronize translations.
Cleanup and optimization of the user pages.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-18:
Synchronize translations.
Cleanup and optimization of the user pages.
Correct subtitles language value for auto-detection.
Editing a user's theme on their behalf doesn't affect the theme currently displayed.
Move theme 'Light alt.' to 0.42.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-19:
Synchronize translations.
Fix subtitles page going out of sync with saved settings.
Fix subtitles preview bug.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-20:
Synchronize translations.
CardBox format option now affects search results as well (home settings).
Add font 'Shanghai' to selectable subtitles fonts.
Improve configuration presets (profile settings).
Cleanup and optimization of the user pages.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-21:
Synchronize translations.
Saving user preferences returns a promise which is more reliable and faster.
User main menu page takes care of its own retranslation through the mean of a dedicated event.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-22:
Synchronize translations.
Cleanup and optimization of the user pages.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-23:
Synchronize translations.
Add an option to preserve localization settings through resets (profile settings).
releaseNotes.10.8.7-24:
Synchronize translations.
Attach a brief description to each configuration presets.
Fix issues affecting user resets done by an admin.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-25:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'Shadowghost/fix-parental'.
Apply patch 'Fix keyboard navigation for INPUT and TEXTAREA'.
Apply patch 'Fix item details banner image alignment'.
Identify 'myJelly' as a Web device and show the correct icon (Dashboard).
Saving new passwords doesn't ask the current password anylonger.Since password resets can be performed without it, asking it was pointless anyway.
releaseNotes.10.8.7-26:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'fix-pagination-limit'.
Upgrade ss 'Digital Clock' to make use of the clock format as it is set by the user rather than a static format.
Fix minor issues found in the code handling the clock formats.
Identify LG Smart TV devices and use their dedicated icon (Dashboard).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-0: Attach an indicator to password protected accounts (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-1:
Synchronize translations.
Fix menu bar pin button disappearing after a reload (login screen/Desktop).
Add ss 'AutoLogout' which, after a 10s countdown, closes the session and jump to the login screen.
Attach icons to user avatars in order to quickly identify password/pin protected accounts as well as admins (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-3:
Synchronize translations.
Upgrade ss 'AutoLogout' to 0.3.
Expand screensaver timer limit to 120 minutes.
Add missing placeholder to the password fields (profile settings).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-4:
Synchronize translations.
Fix users avatar showing a PIN icon with EnableLocalPassword policy in effect and no Easypassword set (login screen).
Also in this particular setup, clicking on the user image doesn't need to prompt a password screen.
Make a public API call to getEndpointInfo() to check whether EnableLocalPassword policy is relevant upon login; this call can be made anonymously with a small server patch. See https://github.com/blob03/jellyfin/commit/1c2f2077de290b59302d1c7dfe0caf9203735512
releaseNotes.10.8.8-5: For the user list, assume the client to be remote by default when connecting an unpatched server (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-6:
Synchronize translations.
Raise Easy passwords size limit from 5 to 8 digits.
Replace some Dashboard alerts with toasts (profile settings).
Check that submitted Easy passwords are well formatted before doing the call to the API.
Fix 'QuickConnect' link not appearing upon first initialization of the user menu even though QC is active on the server.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-7: Apply patch 'Support admin login in QuickConnect #4194' which allows admins to authorize QC requests on behalf of users. Note that the server must also be patched for the feature to work. Either install Jellyfin server or https://github.com/blob03/myJelly-srv-10.8.8
releaseNotes.10.8.8-8:
Synchronize translations.
Quickconnect authentification process is only active from inside the QC submenu which acts as a waiting room (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-9:
Ensure the login screen is refreshed everytime it is invoked.
Hide the password recovery button when connecting from remote (login screen).
Fix app router confused after leaving the password recovery procedure with a call to window.location() (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-10:
Update package.json.
Logging out from the user menu always redirects to the login page even if the client is flagged 'multiserver'.
Option 'multiserver' enabled in config.json.
Add a cancel button to the server selection page.
Add a 'Last Seen...' line under the account names (login screen).
If the (unpatched) server refuses to tell, assume the client to be inside a local network by default (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-11:
Show the spinner while waiting for a QC authorization (login screen).
Apply patch 'thornbill/fix-home-navigation'.
Make the 'Last seen...' line underneath the login screen avatars, a new option of config.json.
Make the login screen clock another option of config.json.
Initial position of the clock can also be set here.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-12:
Apply patch 'thornbill/add-api-context'.
Make the exposure of account details (role and auth method), an option of config.json.
Fix: value set to setLoginClockPos() is an absolute not an offset.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-13:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'Convert-emby-scroller-emby-button'.
Add more customization options for the login screen (config.json).
Cleanup and optimization of Quick Connect authentication (login screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-14:
Synchronize translations.
Fix: Not reporting back wrong PINs when resetting a password (Password recovery).
Fix: Add missing class to the 'Add Server' button (Login screen).
Sort the list of supported languages alphabetically and add an 'Auto' selection (Wizard screen).
Reintroduce cache buster to avoid caching issues when switching between languages (Login screen).
Add an early version of theme 'Arctic' by jakehamilton@hachyderm.io.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-15:
Leave the password fields blank when showing the credentials page for the startup user (Wizard user).
Actually use any custom language set by the user for the setup process (Wizard screens).
Flag the Wizard start page as of type 'login' and get rid of the back button (Wizard start).
Fix the wizard library help button (Wizard library).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-16:
Synchronize translations.
Improve credentials management (Wizard user).
Wizard pages can be tuned with relevant login options from 'config.json'.
Add last access timestamp underneath each pickable server slot (Server selection screen).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-17:
Install a fresh copy of project build files 'package.json', 'webpack*' etc...
Fix: App build fails due to jellyfin SDK unable to resolve an unexported symbol from Node module 'axios'.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-18: Fix: App build failure caused by missing Node module 'compare-versions' needed by Jellyfin SDK.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-19:
Synchronize translations.
Attach 'loginAttemptLeft' indicator to password protected accounts (login page).
Add 'attemptLeft' option to config file 'config.json'.
Tweak indicators positionning and style some more (login page).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-20:
Synchronize translations.
Cleanup and optimization of the login page.
Do not show indicator 'attemptLeft' until at least one failed attempt has been registered.
Add an option to draw account cards in the same visualCardBox format as library items.
Turn the username, normally shown underneath accounts' avatar, an option from 'config.json'.
Add a title attribute to indicators for browser users.
Add an option in config.json to enable theme backdrops in the login page.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-21:
Synchronize translations.
Make option 'visualCardBox' effect cards from the server selection screen.
Correct server cards padding to have them perfectly centered.
Force Quick Connect dialog into fullscreen mode as a workaround to prevent direct clicks into the backdrop overlay.
A default login screen backdrop can be set and backdrops rotation can be turned off inside config.json.
Add two options nightmode and serverLastSeen into config.json.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-22:
Synchronize translations.
Login page backdrop contrast can be set inside 'config.json'.
Apply patch 'more-granular-access-schedule'.
Synchronize 'package.json' with master.
Apply patch 'downloadAll'.
Apply patch 'Add getAdditionalParts method to playbackmanager'.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-23: Fix: disable series' 'downloadAll' option for hosts that don't support file downloading.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-25:
Synchronize package.json.
Check user permission to download files before offering series' 'downloadAll' option.
If an option list ends with a divider, take it off the item's context menu.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-27:
Synchronize translations and node packages.
Enable option 'Details Banner' for TVs (display settings).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-28:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'experimental-display-mode'.
Fix: When restoring a detail page, re-check the value of 'Detail Banner' option.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-29:
Synchronize translations.
Fix alignment of ribbon backdrop with page backdrop (desktop layout).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-30:
Synchronize translations.
Add option 'displayFontSize' to config.json which allows to adjust the base font size (TV layout).
Replace button icon to access display options of videos and images libraries, make it consistent with movies and series.
Add a colorized overlay to the night mode to make things easier for the tired eyes.
Improve style for the backdrop controller widget.
Add host hardware type to host details (About tab).
releaseNotes.10.8.8-31:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'Add stereo downmix setting'.
Apply patch 'Show total count when no pagination is applied'.
Fix: Hide total count message when total count is null.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-32:
Synchronize translations and node packages.
Fix details page layout for people and books when option 'Details Banner' in use.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-33:
Synchronize translations.
Fix layout when rendering backdropless items, such as people, with option 'Details Banner' enabled.
The night mode switch button can be disabled in the display settings.
Enabling night mode manually (using the button) doesn't need the clock or the weather bot though if set as 'auto', the latter must be running.
Apply patch 'Fix detection of SecondaryAudio support'.
Apply patch 'Fix HTML escaping in MediaSession and on remote page'.
Apply patch 'Fix change audio track'.
Apply patch 'Fix AudioContext limit exceeded'.
Apply patch 'Fix XSS vulnerability in plugin repo pages'.
Apply patch 'Fix back action on Hisense TV'.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-34:
Synchronize translations.
Apply patch 'Fix the progressive mp4 transcoding profile'.
Replace 'Auto/Manual' night mode with 'Always'.
Add missing translation key.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-35:
Synchronize translations.
Header pin button default state and visibility for the login screens can be set in config.json.
Fix: Hide 'undefined' Web0s version showing up with a built-in browser (tab 'About').
Login screens can have night mode forced or set manually as defined in config.json.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-36: Fix: a syntax error causing tab 'About' to break with webOS.
releaseNotes.10.8.8-37:
Synchronize translations.
Users can disable/configure the menu pin feature in the display settings.
Auto adjust backdrops position to reflect the current state of the pin.

Update themes 'Light alt. blue', 'Halloween', 'Dark alt.', 'WMC alt.', 'Light alt.'.

Update theme 'WMC Alt.'.

releaseNotes.10.8.9-18:

Update theme 'WMC Alt.'.
Update WeatherBot widget layout.
Remove autofocuser for the profile settings page.
Sort user favorites by date of creation (Date of introduction into the library) in descending order.
Increase hardcoded limit from 20 to 60 favorites per row.

releaseNotes.10.8.9-26:
Synchronize translations.
Update theme 'WMC Exp.'.
Fix SS Digital Clock background margin.
Apply patch 'Add setting for ParallelImageEncodingLimit'.
Update Weatherbot widget to calculate and print time gaps with current sunrise and sunset.
releaseNotes.10.8.9-27:
Synchronize translations.
Fix code flaws of type 'Incomplete string escaping or encoding' reported by online scanner CodeQL.
releaseNotes.10.8.9-28:
Synchronize translations.
Improve layout and fix animations for widget 'WeatherBot'.

releaseNotes.10.8.9-29:
Synchronize translations.
Improve layout and fix animations for widget 'WeatherBot'.
Apply patch 'Rollback hls.js to 1.2.4'.
releaseNotes.10.8.9-30: Fix WeatherBot updater overwriting time gaps from alt view with actual timestamps.
releaseNotes.10.8.9-31:
Synchronize translations.
Fix WeatherBot timestamps overflowing their parent's framing when using some locales.
releaseNotes.10.8.9-32:
Synchronize translations.
Force an immediate refresh when opening the ephemerides screen (Weatherbot).
Increase z-index value for active screen to allow titles to show up (Weatherbot/Desktop).
Refresh rate for the epehemerides screen can be set in config.json, defaults to 8 seconds (Weatherbot).

Synchronize translations and Node.js packages.
Apply patch 'Add font size and theme selection controls to EPUB reader'.
Apply patch 'Add Audio VBR setting'.
Apply patch 'Use form validation to ensure required fields are filled on submission'.
Make Widget 'Digital Clock' use the same fading animation as the Weatherbot.
releaseNotes.10.8.9-35:
Synchronize translations.

Expose the widgets options inside a checkbox list (Digital clock/Weatherbot/Display settings).

Synchronize translations.
Add an option to show current 'Feel Likes' temperature (Weatherbot widget/display settings).
Add an option to hide the location name of the weather station reporting (weatherbot widget/display settings).
